Package com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.shapes.polygons

Class Summary
AnySidedPolygonTool This tool produces PolygonShapes with a variable number of sides.
PolygonPointHandle This class provides a handle that shows up at a particular Locator on a PolygonFigure and reshapes the figure accordingly as it is dragged.
PolygonShape This provides a basic concrete implementation of PolygonFigures that are assumed to be movable and reshapable with observers that want to know when their locations or shapes change.
PolygonTestVisualizer  
PolygonTool This tool produces PolygonShapes with a given number of sides.
TC_Polygon  
TS_PolygonTests
